text:
appearing to wave in the wind, and the absence of a blast crater under the

lunar module are evidence that the event was staged. However, experts have

thoroughly debunked these claims, citing the presence of stars in photos taken

by the astronauts (NASA, 2020), the flag's motion caused by the gentle breeze

on the lunar surface (NASA, 2019), and the lack of a crater due to the lunar

module's gentle touchdown (NASA, 2020).
